title: Apex Legends: Escape Launch Trailer
author: Apex Legends
description:
The Legends are taking a vacation and they’re ready for some fun in the sun...or at least, they think they are. Plan your getaway when Apex Legends: Escape launches November 2. 
  
http://x.ea.com/70896


Apex Legends™ is a free-to-play hero shooter  game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Origin and Steam.

Learn more about Apex Legends: Escape: http://x.ea.com/70896
 
Check out our YouTube channel: http://x.ea.com/56710.
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/playapex.
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playapex/.
Shop official Apex Legends merchandise: https://www.playapexshop.com

#ApexLegendsEscape  #ApexEscape #ApexLegends
